reserveSpot: Reserve your spot for the most inspiring entrepreneurial experience of 2025.
aboutContent: An inclusive event aiming for sustainable impact. This edition seeks to open the doors of the Tunisian ecosystem to the outside world, highlighting opportunities for collaboration, export, strategic partnerships, and immersion in international markets. It will bring together startups, project leaders, investors, mentors, and experts to exchange, inspire, and co-create globally impactful solutions.

impact.f1Desc: International audience across Africa, MENA region & Europe.
impact.f3Desc: Post-event survey: content, logistics, added value.
impact.f6Desc: Media and social networks with international reach.

impactSubheading: What the event has achieved for participants, exhibitors, and partners:

sections.title: PLENARY
sections.moderator: Moderator: Mr. Wassim Laaribi - Journalist and host at Express FM

sessions.title: Panel 1 – International Market Access Strategy: Critical Issues and Operational Levers
Panel 2 - Think global, act local… with us
Panel 3 - Export 2.0: Master digital tools to conquer international markets
Afternoon - B2B & Matchmaking via GITS (physical and virtual)
Workshop 1 – Go further, faster: digital platforms for your internationalization
Workshop 3 – Technical keys to open the doors to the world
Masterclass 1 – How to finance your export activities?
Masterclass 2 – From local to global: maximize your reach with e-commerce and digital platforms, what role for AI?
Masterclass 3 – Go Global, the Right Way…

featuresSubheading: Experiences designed to generate connections, learning, and business opportunities.

featuresFallback.title: Matchmaking Lounge
featuresFallback.subtitle: Curated B2B sessions
featuresFallback.desc: Sit down with buyers, partners, and investors. Our concierge matches you based on sector and intent.

featuresFallback.title: Live Demos Zone
featuresFallback.subtitle: Product in action
featuresFallback.desc: Touch, try, and stress-test new tech—from enterprise software to robotics—guided by the teams who built it.

featuresFallback.title: Gov/Enterprise Tracks
featuresFallback.subtitle: Real procurement paths
featuresFallback.desc: Hear how large buyers select, pilot, and scale solutions. Concrete steps to get vendor-ready.

impact.heading: Event Impact
impact.subheading: Key outcomes and highlights achieved by the event.
impact.participantsDesc: International audience across MENA, EU and North America.
impact.meetingsDesc: Curated matchmaking that produced measurable deal flow.
impact.satisfactionDesc: Post-event survey covering content, logistics and value.
impact.exhibitorsDesc: Showcasing solutions from startups and enterprises.
impact.sessionsDesc: Keynotes, panels and hands-on workshops across 2 days.
impact.coverageDesc: Media mentions and social reach across regions.

partnership.heading: Strategic Partnership: IPDAYS × GITS 2025
partnership.strap: When local impact meets global reach
paragraphs: The 2025 edition marks a unique alliance between IPDAYS and GITS 2025 (Global Investment & Trading Summit).
Together, we create a powerful bridge between regional innovation and international opportunity.
partnership.imageCaption: Connecting Local Innovation to Global Opportunities

role.selectHelp: Selecting shows the form below. Changing the type resets the form and session choices.

BusinessOwner.title: Business owner
BusinessOwner.desc: Owns or co-owns a company. Can create a full profile later, set sectors, products and services.

Consultant.title: Consultant
Consultant.desc: Advises businesses. Ideal if you sell expertise and want to list services later.

Employee.title: Employee
Employee.desc: Represents an organisation. Can network and schedule meetings.

Expert.title: Expert
Expert.desc: Specialist in a field. Great for workshops, mentoring and B2B opportunities.

Investor.title: Investor
Investor.desc: Angel, VC or corporate investor. Can indicate interests and connect with startups/exhibitors.

Student.title: Student
Student.desc: Early career. Learns, networks and discovers opportunities.

hints.maxLang: You can only select up to 3 languages

dragdrop.title: Drop an image here or click to choose

alerts.chooseAtLeastOne: Please choose at least one session (one per timeslot and track family).

sessions.help: Parallel tracks: you may choose one masterclass and one atelier in the same timeslot, but not two from the same family.
sessions.none: No sessions available at the moment.

popups.imageTooLargeBody: The photo exceeds 5 MB. Please choose a smaller image.

finish.received: Registration received. We have also shown a popup with a quick link.

popups.verifySentBody: We sent a new verification link to {{email}}.
popups.verifyFailBody: Please try again in a moment.

verifyPopup.title: Verify your e-mail
verifyPopup.body:
Your account is not verified yet.

Click the button below to receive a new verification e-mail.
It includes your PDF with sessions, QR code, and the verification token.
